verses.text: When the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.+ 126.1 turned…: Heb. returned the returning*

Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath done great things for them.+ 126.2 hath…: Heb. hath magnified to do with them*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath done great things for us; whereof* we are glad.
Turn again our captivity, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, as the streams in the south.
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.+ 126.5 joy: or, singing*
He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him*.+ 126.6 precious…: or, seed basket*
